EXHIBIT 3 (con*t)
We shall be glad to help in any way possible, if you feel something can be done
as I expect it will be, with and by the Center, to which this is also addressed
What do you say? If such a step is taken, I believe capitalizing on the naÂ¬
tional promotion offered by this group would be a considerable advantage.
Cordially,
/s/ H. J. Skomia
